participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily enjoys hands-on activities and has a strong connection to nature. She's a bit shy but values deep conversations.
participant_1.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Charismatic and adventurous, Jake has a passion for vintage cars and enjoys exploring new places with his dogs. He has a laid-back attitude and a love for country music.
participant_2.background: i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i like to work on vintage cars. i've two dogs.
